release.action: Removed links to Rhea when the reaction is not public.
Updated to latest version of intenz (parent), intenz-mapper, rhea-domain, rhea-mapper, biobabel-db, xercesImpl, javax.mail, log4j and junit.
Fixed addition of links to XML (no 'links' element added when there are none to add).
Updated to latest version of intenz-mapper, rhea-domain and rhea-mapper.
Updated to latest version of intenz-xml, which fixes a bug in the generation of the whole-tree XML.
Updated to latest versions of intenz-biopax, rhea-domain, rhea-mapper and biobabel-db modules.
Fixed script for SQL dump.

release.description: Cross references to Rhea from IntEnzXML
release.action: Added cross references to Rhea from IntEnzXML.
Updated to latest versions of domain and xml modules.

Updated dependencies on rhea-mapper - which fixes potential issue with the new ChEBI database server layout -, intenz-xml - which adds a new attribute to better distinguish preliminary EC numbers - and intenz-biopax - which fixes issue with missing EC numbers.
Fixed direction symbol in XCHARS export.
Added support for preliminary EC numbers in exported files.
Updated dependencies on rhea.domain, rhea.mapper, intenz.mapper and biobabel.db modules.
Moved XML schema and generated code to a new independent module (intenz-xml).
Updated dependencies on rhea.domain, rhea.mapper, intenz.mapper and biobabel.db modules.
Added BioPAX export.
Fixed export of fields containing xchars markup: it is not enclosed in CDATA sections anymore, and xchars tags take their namespace prefix.
Updated dependency to latest mapper, translator and biobabel.db modules.
Updated dependencies to latest mapper (and domain) module.
Updated dependency to latest mapper module.
